idea:
Pink Harvest Farms began with a simple goal - creating smarter foods that make a balanced and holistic lifestyle accessible in the modern world. The aim was to indigenous grow high quality gourmet superfoods , which were previously imported and make them available to the Indian consumer at affordable value.

Starting with a single acre, for us this has been a labour of love and we are proud to be a part of the global food community.

Our promise is sustainability, quality and above all - TASTE.

Visit our website www.pinkharvest.com
name: Pink Harvest Farms

idea:
Third Bell Productionz Pvt Ltd. in is in the business of Production, Distribution, Marketing, Acquisition, Release, Streaming & other Known/Unknown services of Films, Theatre, Television, OTT Content & several other known/unknown formats as may be newly added in the Entertainment industry. 


Advent of smartphone mobile internet has enabled entertainment of personal choice anytime, anywhere thus rendering Television viewership redundant. The OTT is the answer. Many channels have also additionally entered into OTT platform. TV is gradually becoming obsolete because of its standardization of content, making it look the same, monotonous and boring. TV content remained limited to a restricted genre/narrative with a specific SEC in mind. Content, therefore, is something that can’t be caged as a fixed program chart. TV demanded from its viewers was a fixed commitment to be present at a certain time for a certain number of hours.

 

OTT on the other hand is flexible in terms of time , place , open to experiment, innovative, in short it’s all what the present generation want and is available already.
name: THIRD BELL PRODUCTIONZ PRIVATE LIMITED
